Public Class TrackingAnnotationCollection Inherits List(Of String)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
附註是您定義的 `strings`，其中包含與某種追蹤資料關聯的資訊。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

Docs.summary: 使用字串附註的清單，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection> 會初始化為包含 `annotations` 中所指定的字串。
